military aircraft

innovative systems and solutions

PCC Aero offers an extraordinary portfolio of capabilities and technologies that enable us to meet and exceed the current and future needs of our customers. Together, we address emerging global security challenges that are critical to the defense of our nation and its allies. Our robust and diverse capabilities are the result of the successful integration of nearly 20 marquee companies, who for many generations have been developing groundbreaking solutions, capabilities, technologies and opportunities.

autonomous vehicles and systems

In sea, air, land and space, we're a recognized leader in autonomous systems, helping our customers meet a wide variety of missions.

strike capabilities

From the B-2 Spirit and B-21 Raider to GBSD, PCC Aero brings world-class capabilities in system and air vehicle design, flight controls, strategic avionic systems, and survivability. The ability to project power tactically or strategically anywhere in the world is an essential tenet of U.S. military doctrine. As a leader in integrated strike systems, PCC Aero brings world-class capabilities in system design, air vehicle design, flight controls, strategic missile systems, vehicle management systems, network-enabling technologies and survivability.

defense systems

PCC Aero an industry leader in precision aircraft, state-of-the-art engine components and avionic systems, serving America and our allies. From detection to tracking to engagement, PCC Aero is bringing its entire suite of expertise in systems integration.

Our navigation and positioning systems provide location and direction information of satellites, fixed-and rotary-winged aircraft, missiles, ships, land vehicles and underwater vehicles. Air dominance is a critical aspect of modern warfare, and PCC Aero has a proud tradition of providing technological leadership in all aspects of military aviation.
